price: 33. Bozongisela ngai yango, na yango abandi kokata yango makolo na bakingo.
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
